Duel your friends and bet on the outcomes! Also looks badass.
text.gambapvp.battle_screen: The following screens will introduce you to the basic concepts of GambaPVP. They are almost all interactive - after reading the explanation you can play with the values to see how they affect The Box™ in the playground in real-time. In any of these screens you can open the inspector with the button on the bottom to see how this screen is laid out internally.
